name: Wave Pattern Animation
description: 20 spheres creating a beautiful sine wave pattern using NonPhysics animation

functionCalls.code: const objects = []; for(let i=0; i<20; i++) { const id = `wave_${i}`; objects.push({ id, type: 'Sphere', position: [i*2 - 20, 5, 0], radius: 0.4, color: `hsl(${i*18}, 70%, 50%)`, nonPhysics: true }); globalNonPhysicsEngine.animateObject(id, { code: `mesh.position.y = 5 + Math.sin(time * 2 + ${i * 0.5}) * 3;` }); } return objects;
